## ComponentLinkFieldDefinition type

Represents a Component link field definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ComponentLinkFieldDefinition = ItemPublishableFieldDefinition & {
    AllowedTargetSchemas?: Array<Link>;
    AllowMultimediaLinks?: boolean;
    DefaultValue?: Link;
};
```
